appName.description: Incompat is a companion for Webcompat.com. It helps track compatibility bugs for sites that you build or use every day.

appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

browserActionTitle.message: Incompat - Click to see webcompat issues on this site!
browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button
